Zubi is the online food label calculator and data management software our customers say they can’t live without!


Spend less time chained to the computer, and get on with growing your business.
Zubi makes life easier for ingredient manufacturers, food and beverage manufacturers, contract manufacturers, importers, restaurants, bakeries, butcheries, catering companies, and more.










 Free to join: Pay only when you calculate a recipe.
 Designed exclusively to meet FSANZ compliance requirements
 Build recipes, develop new formulations, track changes
 Zubi calculates accurate nutrition information panels (NIPs) for you
 Track allergens, warnings and advisory statements and capture ALL on-pack detail
 Print or download reports and labels directly from Zubi


 Streamline operations with an All-in-One system the whole team can access online, any time, anywhere
 Your data is stored securely on our servers
 Friendly local support team at hand
 Reliable software that upgrades automatically, ensuring you always have the latest version.
 No contracts, no worries! On the Casual and Frequent plans, cancel any time, no strings attached.



Test drive Zubi for free!
How it works
What are you waiting for? No credit card required upfront for our Casual plan!

 






                                Zubi saves me time by making it easy to add my own products, customise recipes and print labels.
                                My food tech can then access my recipes to double check that I have entered everything correctly ensuring no costly mistake before launching.

                                Zubi has streamlined our food labelling procedure -
                                it’s saved us time on NIP calculations, allergen checks, recipe adjustments and design so our NPD team can focus on new delicious flavours.
                                Zubi gives us the ability to have information on hand and confidence in our labelling for the New Zealand & Australian markets.

                                Being online and accessible from anywhere means no software to download or upgrade and no having to remember to back up.
                                It is so convenient and our data is safe. What a relief! Zubi makes it easy to handle the ingredients we manufacture ourselves.
                            





                                    Sheila
                                    Cake Concepts








3 Steps To Better Labelling
Creating labels is better with Zubi - no other software platform is designed exclusively to FSANZ requirements (Australia and New Zealand)


1. Find or add your ingredients
 Select from our large database of preloaded ingredients or enter your own manually
 Select country (or countries) of origin for each ingredient
 Declare compound ingredients accurately
 Capture allergens with the option of does not contain, contains or may contain
 Add as many nutrients as you like
 Note qualifiers such as gluten-free, Halal, organic and many more
 Note suppliers - select from our database or enter your own
 Attach PIFs or supplier spec sheet







2. Build your recipe
 Versioning control (Join on an Unlimited Corporate Plan for unlimited recipes)
 Group similar ingredients (eg Herbs, Vegetables, Nuts)
 Split compound ingredients for more accurate ingredient listings
 Account for baking loss
 Override ingredient declarations for specific products
 Add additional nutrients to NIP
 Add the percentage of ingredient or group of ingredients
 Track allergens from cross-contamination during processing
 Manage complex, multi-level formulations








3. Create your label or report
 Note storage and usage instructions
 Add marketing text
 Enter shelf life by use by, best before, baking date and number of days or specific date, which you can set to recalculate each time a label is printed.
 Copy reports to Word or download as a PDF
 Print black and white labels to the size you need
 Best before date resets every time you print a new label
 Print labels directly without any other software needed.
 Multiple logins, including read-only access for admin and marketing, allows for smoother interdepartmental communication and less wasted time.
 Casual and frequent plans: Pay just once and enjoy 12 months of unlimited changes until annual renewal date.
 Corporate plans: pay one fixed annual fee for access to your formulations, with no limit on changes to recipes.






Trial Zubi on a Casual account - you only pay when you’re ready to calculate your product.   Sign up to Zubi
